lead_paragraph: The German Jenny Wolf broke a world record in the 500 meters that had stood for nearly six years, finishing in 37.04 seconds at the world single distances speedskating championships yesterday in Kearns, Utah. She upstaged Shani Davis, who became the first American to win an event when he finished first in the men’s 1,000.
